ygData.subject: Buffs and not to buff...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve a question.... If you are PVP on NON PVP channels you cannot buff nor be buffed by someone. I noticed that on the PVP channel everyone has the RED name,
ygData.messageBody:
I've a question....
If you are PVP on NON PVP channels you cannot buff nor be buffed by
someone. I noticed that on the PVP channel everyone has the RED name, thus
meaning PvP. CAN you buff someone? I know you may have to group with
someone to do certain buffs, but Spirit of Wolf and such...do they work?
CAN you buff just like on the other channels as if you weren't PVP ???
If anyone knows, please mail me a clue!

Thanks family!

Sandy (Kal-Ell)
